ygData.subject: Re: To All EQ players on this list
ygData.msgSnippet: I DLed AC and tried it. The Char creation part is pretty cool : 1) Can configure face, eyes, mouth, hair color, skin color and clothing color. 2) Lots of skill
ygData.messageBody:
I DLed AC and tried it.

The Char creation part is pretty cool :
1) Can configure face, eyes, mouth, hair color, skin color and
clothing color.
2) Lots of skill to select and learn, if blur just choose a
class and they will have
skill and stats configure for it. eg ..Blademaster sound
fun !

The graphics in the game is not as good as Everquest.
No zone border, char walking pass zone will be jerky and mobs wont give up
chasing you
sometime.
Dont know where the safe places are. (just played the game)

Bottom Line
-------------

Doesnt really impress me but now only in beta.
Havent tried magic system and (the mentor and pupil thing) allegance ..dun
know spelling

Einan
